snippet: Molson Coors had been looking to raise its profile in international markets. And StarBev, whose markets include the Czech Republic and Croatia, was a perfect target.
abstract: Molson Coors had been looking to raise its profile in international markets. And StarBev, whose markets include the Czech Republic and Croatia, was a perfect target.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: In StarBev Deal, Molson Bets Big on Growth
